text: Đurđa Ivezić, (17 October 1936 – 11 December 2020) was a Croatian actress. She was born in Zagreb. She also voiced dubbed Betty Rubble in Croatian for The Flintstones and Smurfette in The Smurfs.Jutarnji list Sandra Bolanča: Gargamel, Papa Štrumpf, Kremenko i Vanda žive u Zagrebu, 10. listopada 2009. Ivezić also starred in H-8, Back of the Medal and The Magician's Hat. Ivezić died on 11 December 2020 in Zagreb of COVID-19 at the age of 84.Od posljedica koronavirusa preminula poznata hrvatska glumica Đurđa Ivezić ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Zagreb Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Croatia
title: Đurđa Ivezić
